title: WELCOME TO HOT TIPS NAILS
content:
Located in the heart of Edmonton, Alberta T6H 4K1, Hot Tips Nails has become an industry leader in nail services. Our nail salon was founded on the idea of delivering only the finest nail and spa services to clients all over the Edmonton area. 

Our nail salon is a haven of relaxation that promotes comfort, beauty, well-being, and health. Our priorities are client-focused services, high-quality products, and above all else, grade-A sanitation standards.

We are committed to bringing you the latest advances in beauty care and only use the most trusted brands in the beauty industry. Our world-class products, services, and top technologies will help you feel great and look your best! 

Hot Tips Nails understands that Safety and Sanitation are key to your peace of mind. Our implements are medically sterilized and disinfected after each use. Buffers and files are used only once then discarded. All pedicure procedures are done with liner protection. And above all, staff are trained to follow a proper sanitization protocol that puts the client's hygiene as the number one priority.

Come to us now and enjoy the relaxing moment.
